text: Uye takava tinoyambutsa vana vaIzirairi gungwa (mune zvakanaka), uye vakauya pane vanhu vakanga vakazvipira kuzvimwe zvidhori zvavo (mukunamata). Vakati: “Iwe Musa! Tigadzirire chimwari sezvimwari zvavanazvo.” (Musa) Akati: “Zvirokwazvo, muri vanhu vasingazivi (Hukuru hwaAllah nezvakamanikidzirwa kwamuri).”
